trigger: The key or string used to identify bot commands (we recommend !)
default_status: Status to show if not playing anything
giphy_api_key: Giphy API key. If blank, we'll use the beta API key
giphy_rating: limit Giphy by rating (y, g, pg, pg-13 or r)
auto_join: Whether or not K9 should auto-join your voice channel on playback if he is not in a voice channel (true/false)
cache_dir: The absolute path to the cache directory for audio playback
